mapper.insert: insert into dz_excelTitle( id, typeId, ename, cname, isShow, addTime, status, sortId, comments ) values( #{id}, #{typeId}, #{ename}, #{cname}, #{isShow}, #{addTime}, #{status}, #{sortId}, #{comments} )
mapper.update: update dz_excelTitle set typeId=#{typeId}, ename=#{ename}, cname=#{cname}, isShow=#{isShow}, status=#{status}, comments=#{comments} where id=#{id}
update dz_excelTitle set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select id,typeId,ename,cname,isShow,addTime,status,sortId,comments from dz_excelTitle where status != '-1' order by sortId asc, id asc
